trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown in a thread upon cancellation of an operation that the thread was executing.
trans-unit.target: 当线程取消一个正在执行的操作时在线程中引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the task that was canceled had an associated cancellation token, it is returned by the <xref:System.OperationCanceledException.CancellationToken%2A> property, and the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the token is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果已取消的任务具有关联的取消标记，它返回<xref:System.OperationCanceledException.CancellationToken%2A>属性，与<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的令牌的属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a system-supplied error message.
trans-unit.target: 使用系统提供的错误信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The operation was canceled."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"操作已取消"。 将新实例的属性

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A nullreference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Nullreference (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.
trans-unit.target: 在非已取消状态下创建一个取消标记。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 描述该错误的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: The error message string.
trans-unit.target: 错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.
trans-unit.target: 在非已取消状态下创建一个取消标记。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 与已取消的操作关联的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 用取消令牌初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The operation was canceled."
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Exception.Message%2A>为系统提供的消息的描述错误，如"操作已取消"。 将新实例的属性

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A nullreference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Nullreference (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: `token`.
trans-unit.target: `token`。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 承载序列化对象数据的对象。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 关于来源和目标的上下文信息

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 用序列化数据初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数在反序列化过程中调用，以便重建通过流传输的异常对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 属性类型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 条件

trans-unit.source: `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: `innerException`。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token created in the non-canceled state.
trans-unit.target: 在非已取消状态下创建一个取消标记。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 与已取消的操作关联的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message and a cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误信息和取消令牌初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
A null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 `Nothing`）。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: `token`.
trans-unit.target: `token`。

trans-unit.source: The error message that explains the reason for the exception.
trans-unit.target: 解释异常原因的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: A cancellation token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 与已取消的操作关联的取消标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> class with a specified error message, a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception, and a cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的错误消息、对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用以及取消令牌初始化 <see cref="T:System.OperationCanceledException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: `message` 的内容被设计为人可理解的形式。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.OperationCanceledException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.OperationCanceledException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property Type
trans-unit.target: 属性类型

trans-unit.source: Condition
trans-unit.target: 条件

trans-unit.source: `innerException`.
trans-unit.target: `innerException`。

trans-unit.source: `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message`。

trans-unit.source: `token`.
trans-unit.target: `token`。

trans-unit.source: Gets a token associated with the operation that was canceled.
trans-unit.target: 获取与已取消的操作关联的令牌。

trans-unit.source: A token associated with the operation that was canceled, or a default token.
trans-unit.target: 与已取消的操作关联的令牌，或默认令牌。

trans-unit.source: If the token is associated with a canceled operation, the <xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the token returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果令牌已取消操作，与关联<xref:System.Threading.CancellationToken.IsCancellationRequested%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>的令牌的属性返回`true`。
